long_description: The large Woods Family Cooler has a padded body and interior dividers to help protect your food and keep things organized when you're camping for a weekend or spending a sunny day at the park. Cooler folds flat for convenient storage when it's not in use. Interior volume of 3,051 cu. in. (50 liters) lets you bring along plenty of food and drinks. End handles and a shoulder strap make it easy to transport the cooler from the car to the campsite. Use the front pocket and mesh side pocket to stash utensils, napkins and a bottle opener within easy reach. Closeout.
short_description: The large Woods Family Cooler has a padded body and interior dividers to help protect your food and keep things organized when you're camping for a weekend or spending a sunny day at the park.
